)
self <- odUS.by.vax

self %>% od.fread("csv.cached")

self %>% od.fwrite(timestamp = T);

self$dt[ , Date:= as.Date(paste(mmwr_week,1),"%Y%U %u") ]

              measure.vars= patterns(crude="^crude_", age_adj="^age_adj_", monthly_age_adj="^monthly_age_adj_"), value.factor = T )
